      • retrieveTransactionInformation

        @Deprecated
void retrieveTransactionInformation(String checkoutToken)
                                    throws PaydiantClientException
        Deprecated. As of 6.5.0.3.a. Use retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int) or retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int, Date, Date) instead.
        Retrieve transaction information.
        Parameters:
        checkoutToken - the checkout token
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException - the paydiant client exception

      • retrieveTransactionInformation

        @Deprecated
void retrieveTransactionInformation(String checkoutToken,
                                             int startIndex,
                                             int noOfRecords)
                                    throws PaydiantClientException
        Deprecated. As of 6.5.0.3.a. Use retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int) or retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int, Date, Date) instead.
        This method will return the checkout token type (PAYMENT/REFUND/OFFER). If the token type is PAYMENT the tender types will be returned. If the token type is REFUND, then the refundable receipts will be returned for the given search criteria.
        Parameters:
        checkoutToken -
        startIndex -
        noOfRecords -
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException

      • retrieveTransactionInformation

        @Deprecated
void retrieveTransactionInformation(String checkoutToken,
                                             int startIndex,
                                             int noOfRecords,
                                             Date startDate,
                                             Date endDate)
                                    throws PaydiantClientException
        Deprecated. As of 6.5.0.3.a. Use retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int) or retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int, Date, Date) instead.
        Retrieve transaction information.
        Parameters:
        checkoutToken - the checkout token
        startIndex - the start index
        noOfRecords - the no of records
        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException - the paydiant client exception

      • setTransactionRetrievalListener

        void setTransactionRetrievalListener(ITransactionRetrievalListener listener)
        Sets the transaction retrieval listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the new transaction information retrieval listener. This can be either an implementation of ITransactionRetrievalListener or ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener or an extended instance of TransactionRetrievalListenerAdapter.
        See Also:
        ITransactionRetrievalListener, ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener, TransactionRetrievalListenerAdapter

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the transaction retrieval listener and sets it to null.
        Since:
        4.4.0.2

      • retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo

        void retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String checkoutToken,
                                                 int startIndex,
                                                 int noOfRecords)
        Retrieve transaction details with split tender information. Use ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener or an extended instance of TransactionRetrievalListenerAdapter as the listener.

        On successful retrieval of data, the ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener.onTransactionInformationRetrievalSuccess(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.TransactionInformation) will get called and on failure ITransactionRetrievalListener.onTransactionInformationRetrievalError(PaydiantException) will get called. Refer to the core service ITransactionManagerService.retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int) for applicable error codes.
        Parameters:
        checkoutToken - the checkout token
        startIndex - the start index
        noOfRecords - the no of records
        Since:
        3.5.0.1
        See Also:
        ITransactionManagerFacade.retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int), ITransactionManagerService.retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int)

      • retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo

        void retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String checkoutToken,
                                                 int startIndex,
                                                 int noOfRecords,
                                                 Date startDate,
                                                 Date endDate)
        Retrieve transaction details with split tender information. Use ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener or an extended instance of TransactionRetrievalListenerAdapter as the listener.

        On successful retrieval of data, the ITransactionRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener.onTransactionInformationRetrievalSuccess(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.TransactionInformation) will get called and on failure ITransactionRetrievalListener.onTransactionInformationRetrievalError(PaydiantException) will get called. Refer to the core service ITransactionManagerService.retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int, Date, Date) for applicable error codes.
        Parameters:
        checkoutToken - the checkout token
        startIndex - the start index
        noOfRecords - the no of records
        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date
        Since:
        3.5.0.1
        See Also:
        ITransactionManagerFacade.retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int, Date, Date), ITransactionManagerService.retrieveTransactionDetailsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, int, int, Date, Date)
